Chengdu noticed that the application used by their cousin's hardware store has a useful feature for tracking stock. How can Chengdu use this for their grocery inventory management program dynamically to monitor and update grocery items in stock?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: By completely rewriting the program and only borrowing the UI design
QuestionJSON.Answer2: By copying the entire application's code and using it as their own
QuestionJSON.Answer3: By identifying the parts of the cousin's application that deals with stock tracking and incorporating similar logic into their grocery program
QuestionJSON.Answer4: By creating an entirely new feature that's unrelated to stock tracking
QuestionJSON.Explanation: The best approach would be to understand, modify and incorporate only the parts of the cousin's program that handle stock tracking - this aligns with the principle of reusing and remixing existing code to create something new or add more features to a program.
